Judul: DEVELOPMENT AND OPTIMIZATION OF A CONTROL ALGORITHM FOR MULTI-MODE HYBRID POWERTRAIN
Abstrak: The main goal of this thesis is to design a methodology process of developing a heuristic control algorithm for a parallel hybrid vehicle from results of an optimal control simulation model, controlled by dynamic programming method.
Kata Kunci: Hybrid vehicle, Multi-mode hybrid, Heuristic control algorithm, Hybrid powertrain, GT-Suite
